DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate improvement skeletal muscle energetic capacity , endothelial dysfunction glycemic control induce physical training 20 sedentary patient type 2 diabetes.The protocol consist physical train program 3 session 30 minute per week six consecutive week . A skeletal muscle biopsy , cardiac humeral artery ultrasound , glycemic tensional holters perform end physical training program .
DOC.criteria: sedentary adult type 2 diabetes BMI 25 35 kg/mÂ² Hba1c < 10 % unstable coronary artery disease advance peripheral occlusive arterial disease proteinuria > 3 g/d / creatinine clearance < 30 ml / mn advance diabetic neuropathy
